General.Name: Beijing Kunlun Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Kunlun Tech Co., Ltd. develops and publishes web games in China and internationally. It operates Opera, an information distribution and metaverse platform; StarX, a social entertainment platform; and XIANLAIHUYU, a leisure and entertainment platform, as well as mobile game platform Ark games and equity investment Kunlun Capital. The company was formerly known as Beijing Kunlun Tech Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Kunlun Tech Co., Ltd. in June 2021. The company was founded in 2008 and is based in Beijing, China. Kunlun Tech Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Beijing Kunlun World Wide Technology Share Co., Ltd.
